reviews.review_msg: Excellent prof! Great lectures and very motivating! Gives excellent feedback on essays and appreciates original thought and effort!

The IR theory course I took with Eric was the best course I ever took in a University.  Eric was not afraid to challenge us; treated us as potential graduate students; assumed (perhaps wrongly) that we all share his passion for theory (but a great assumption nonetheless). It was inspiring to have so many ideas thrown at us.
